title: A War on Science by Richard Dawkins
description:
This film by Richard Dawkins is absolutely SCARY. It shows the utter ignorance, arrogance and aggression of Christian fundamentalists in the USA. If these people gain power - which they already have in some states - America will be propelled back into the Middle Ages. Some of the laws in the States are already medieval and inhuman (like the now widespread use of torture, capital punishment and other draconian laws not found in any other civilised country outside the US except maybe Iran and other rogue states). But the most unsettling thing is that many of these imbeciles look forward to Armageddon (the final battle) since according to their moronic beliefs it will hail their ascent to heaven. A country as large as the US with nuclear weapons and a medieval mindset is the most scary thing imaginable. Day by day democracy in the US is being eroded and Christian fundamentalists (like Bush who claims God told him to invade Iraq) are seizing more and more power. When will the remaining, intelligent Americans wake up to the danger?

For more imformation go to: http://richarddawkins.net/
